files.description: Modified the `processUserComplianceAndPenalties` function to check for user sessions before applying penalties.
Fixed `any` types and other linting errors.
Fixed `any` types and other linting errors.
Removed the unused `BudgetDisplayWithCompliance` component and the import of `ComplianceChecker`.
Added the missing `onStartAuction` prop to the `PlayerSearchResultsProps` interface.
Fixed errors related to undefined variables.
Fixed errors related to the `db.all` method.
Fixed a type error related to the `recordUserLogout` function.
